articles.description: Crypto’s lack of connections with traditional finance means its problems haven’t spilled over to the economy

articles.author: Alicia Wallace
articles.title: Latest weekly jobless claims jump to 240,000 - CNN
articles.description: First-time weekly claims for unemployment benefits jumped to 240,000 for the week ended November 19, according to data released Wednesday by the Bureau of Labor Statistics. That's a sharp increase of 17,000 from the previous week's upwardly revised tally of 2…
